title: varishai koNarndu vandAr
sahitya:
varishai koNarndu vandAr shIr varishai koNarndu vandAr 
mangaiyar kaigaLukkaNi paNiyAna vaLaiyODu kankaNam-uravenat-
tONa tangiDu mangaLamAnad kANa dAmOdaranukku rAdhA kalyANa


anupallavi

  varishai alankAra taruNiyargaL kUTTam tAngAdu pOnadE rambhaiyargaL ATTam 
murashai oliyaDakkum mozhi naghait-tETTam mOhana kaNNanait-tEDi alaiyudu kaNNOTTam


caraNam    mundiri manipUvanti kuzhaliravai muttu pUnguzhaliNaitta vAsamum 
mOdakamuruvi kannaTrUvi pala munadu pinadAna padumai phalahAramum
endiranadu ena kaNDavar mayanga mUndu mayangiyar AravAramum
iLamaiyavar ulagoDu avaLiyumuraviDa idu aduvena iyalAda kalyANa
